trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: You can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
trait.text: You can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when you speak in Bullywug (DMG).

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
trait.text: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: Your long jump is up to 20 feet and your high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Bullywug (DMG).
